sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row no-gutters>
            <v-col sm="10" class="mx-auto">
                <v-card class="pa-5">
                    <v-card-title>
                        AÃ±ade un nuevo post
                    </v-card-title>
                    <v-divider></v-divider>
                    <v-form ref="form" class="pa-5" enctype="multipart/form-data">
                        <v-text-field label="Titulo" prepend-icon="mdi-note" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
                        <v-text-field label="Categoria" prepend-icon="mdi-view-list" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
                        
                        <v-textarea label="Contenido" prepend-icon="mdi-note-plus" :rules="rules"></v-textarea>

                        <v-file-input :rules="rules" show-size counter multiple label="Selecciona una imagen"></v-file-input>

                        <v-btn type="submit" class="mt-3" color="primary">Subir post</v-btn>
                    </v-form>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default{
    data(){
    return{
        rules: [(value) =>!!value||"Esta campo es obligat"]
    }
}
}
</script>
